document.title: An Overview of the Class View Hierarchy

toc.envision_title: An Overview of the Class View Hierarchy

xmlkeyword.term: Overview of the EiffelEnvision Class View

paragraph.paragraph:
The ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfClassViewWindow.htmClass View window, like the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfSolutionExplorerDialog.htmSolution Explorer window, contains projects, at the top-level. The number of EiffelEnvision projects in the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfClassViewWindow.htmClass View is directly representative of the number of the same projects contained in the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfSolutionExplorerDialog.htmSolution Explorer. Expanding a node that represents an EiffelEnvision project, represented by the ../images/project.ico icon, will display a tree of clusters.xmlclusters.
Note: Expanding an EiffelEnvision project that has not been compiled, or has not compiled information available, will display a the message "System needs to be fully compiled for browsing." EiffelEnvision projects require a project be ../../compiling_projects/compiling_projects.xmlBuilt before browsing the information contained within the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfClassViewWindow.htmClass View.
The structure of an EiffelEnvision project in the index.xmlClass View adheres to the following hierarchy convention:

Once a project node has been expanded, it will display a tree of index.xmlCluster Nodes. Within cluster nodes, subcluster nodes and classes.xmlClass Nodes will be presented in a list merging the two. Expanding a subcluster will show more subclusters and classes.xmlClass Nodes for the given cluster context. If a class has been compiled in a project, denoted by a blue icon, that classes.xmlClass Nodes can then in turn be expanded to reveal its features.xmlFeature Nodes. Note: classes.xmlClass Nodes and features.xmlFeature Nodes also show statuary information regarding their respective status and usage from within the project. Please refer to the respective documentation on each for more information.

link.label: Class View and Object Browser Icons
